bb.desc: 12 combo Earth attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP), boosts Def relative to Atk for 3 turns, boosts Atk, Def, Rec for 3 turns, damage taken may restore HP for 3 turns, adds probable 2 turns Atk, Def reduction infliction counter for 3 turns & may purge HP Barrier from all foes (PVP mode only)
bb.name: Notch Tumble

dbb.desc: 40 combo grand dual attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP), boosts critical damage, BB Atk, Atk relative to max HP, Def relative to Atk, damage taken restores HP, activates Light barrier, 100% damage reduction, 100% evasion, 60% chance Atk, Def reduction infliction counter & 80% KO resistance
dbb.name: Goldenhorn Radiance

dictionary.description:
One of the twelve creature candidates in a competition to be the best assistant for the divine Emperor Yu, Goat was small in stature, but possessed an altruistic heart and was always looking out for everyone.

Having become a well-liked mountain "spirit" of a sort in the earthly realm where the celestial creatures were sent to in human guise, Alphieas the awestruck villagers named the little elfin being that came into their midstrather enjoyed his new home. The tall, snow-covered peaks and mountainous ridges evoked a sense of longing like never before, and he knew that he would be staying here for the long term.

But like the fairies of folklore, beneath that childlike guise lies a far more eerie secret.

Just as coins have two sides to them, so do the helpful elfin fairies of the mountain. Alphie's cartload of discarded items, some weathered but lovingly polished to a shine, invariably shows up whenever a lost traveler faces deepening dusk in one of the many twisting valleys. With bright eyes and a jaunty step, Alphie ensures their survival with timely aidperhaps a warm coat or a pickaxe for a rock slide. Those who notice do not ask why the coat has the nostalgic scent, or why the pickaxe has a small name carved into its base; in a crisis, any help is welcome.

At the end of another night rescuing the lost, Alphie always makes sure to tip his hat to the little rock mounds every few roads or so. To him, he was only a conduit for these tools; those who had moved on had no need of them, after all.

For just like the mountain fairies, Alphie looks after more than just the livinghe helps the dead look after them too.
dictionary.evolution:
Ever see the sun from the mountaintop?
Makes you think about the wonders of nature, huh?
You humans can be wonderful too, if ya tried.
dictionary.fusion:
Shucks, that's fer me?
Ya didn't have ta do that,
but it's nice knowing people look out for ya!
dictionary.summon:
Hiya! Ya need anything, let me know anytime, ya hear?
Don't matter if it's past or present or future!
Ya can always count on me!
